name: プロデューサー
text: 甘奈、そろそろ──
trans: Amana, I think it's about time we—

name: 甘奈
text:
…………甘奈ひとりで……
……どうしたらいいの──……？
trans:
...If I have to do this all by myself...
...I'm not really sure how to handle it—

name: プロデューサー
text:
（……甘奈に考えがあるなら、尊重したい
でも……）
trans:
(Amana has her own worries, and I want to respect
that...)

name: プロデューサー
text: （…………俺に、できることは……）
trans: (...But I really want to help her in any way I can.)

name: プロデューサー
text:
……なぁ、甘奈
悩んでること、話してくれないか？
trans:
...Hey, Amana. Is there something on your mind?
Do you want to talk about it?

name: 甘奈
text: えっ──
trans: Huhー

name: 甘奈
text:
──もうっ、やだなぁプロデューサーさん
また心配してくれてるの？　甘奈は大丈夫だってば──
trans:
Oh, come on, Producer-san. You're worrying about
me again? I already told you that I'm fineー

name: プロデューサー
text: 甘奈
trans: Amana.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……頼むよ
俺のためだと思ってさ
trans:
...I'm begging you, please think of it as something 
for me.

name: 甘奈
text: …………ずるい
trans: ...So unfair.

name: 甘奈
text:
そんな言い方、ずるいよ
甘奈、話したくないのに……──
trans:
That way of asking... It's just so unfair of you...
I really didn't want to talk about this...

name: プロデューサー
text: ……ごめんな。それでも、だ
trans: ...I'm sorry, but still—

name: 甘奈
text:
…………
プロデューサーさんのバカ……
trans:
............
Producer-san, you're such an idiot...

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈は今、きっと……
乗り越えなきゃいけない壁の前にいるんだよ
trans:
I'm really facing this huge wall, and if I don't 
overcome it... I don't know what'll happen.

name: 甘奈
text: …………だから、優しくしないで
trans: That's why, please don't be kind to me anymore...

name: 甘奈
text:
甘やかさないでほしいの、プロデューサーさん
甘奈に──……
trans:
I want you to stop spoiling me.
Producer-san, could you...

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈に、厳しいことを言って……？
trans: Could you please use harsh words on me...?

name: プロデューサー
text:
……必要なら、遠慮なく言ってるよ
でも、今はそれが必要だとは思えない
trans:
....If it's necessary, then I would.
But I don't think now's the right time for that.

name: プロデューサー
text:
今の甘奈に必要なのは、助けに見えるんだ
……俺の手を取ってくれないか、甘奈
trans:
It seems like what you need right now is help, not
harshness. Would you like to reach out to me, Amana?

name: 甘奈
text:
言いたくない……っ
だって甘奈、本当は──……
trans:
I don't want to admit it...! 
I mean, the me right now is...

name: プロデューサー
text:
……今の甘奈は、怖がってるよな
それは、俺には取り除けないか？
trans:
I think you're scared right now, Amana. Is there
anything I can do to help you out?

name: プロデューサー
text:
……俺は、いつだって甘奈の味方でありたいし、
力になりたいんだ
trans:
I'll always be by your side, no matter what, Amana.
I always want to help you.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……頼りないところがあれば、
絶対に直すって約束するから、俺を信じて──
trans:
...Even if the solution to your problems seems out of
reach, I promise I'll do everything I can to find a way.
So please, trust me.

name: 甘奈
text:
違うっ
プロデューサーさんが悪いんじゃなくてっ
trans: No! It's not that you're at fault, Producer-san.

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈がずるいからでっ……──！
trans: It's all because... I was tricking everyone...!

name: プロデューサー
text: ……もう少し詳しく、話せるか？
trans:
...If it's okay with you, could you tell me more about
that?

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈は……ずっと、無責任なの……
trans:
I've been thinking that... I've always been such an
irresponsible person...

name: 甘奈
text:
ひとりでお仕事する覚悟もないのに……！
できるふりをして……！
trans:
I've always acted like I could handle everything on my
own, but I really don't even have the courage to face
it all alone.

name: 甘奈
text:
ずっと……
みんなに嘘をついてるみたいで……
trans: It's like... I've been lying to everyone lately.

name: 甘奈
text:
自分で始めたはずなのに……
途中で、つらくなって……
trans:
Even though I started all this with so much optimism,
when things got tough...

name: 甘奈
text: ……ずるばっかりなの……
trans: I just faked my feelings through it all....

name: 甘奈
text: だからっ……！
trans: That's why...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
……そうか
そうやって、甘奈は今まで頑張ってたんだな
trans:
...That sounds really tough, Amana. I understand why
you'd feel this way, especially if you've been trying
to handle everything on your own.

name: 甘奈
trans: Eh—

name: プロデューサー
text:
不安だったんじゃないか……？
──……ひとりで、大変だったな
trans:
It's okay to worry and feel overwhelmed, alright...?
Especially when you're facing things alone, you don't
have to go through it all by yourself.

name: 甘奈
text:
……呆れないの……？
どうしてだよって、怒ったりとか……──
trans:
You're not going to drop the subject? Aren't you
going to ask me 'Why the heck did you do that?' or
something like that?

name: プロデューサー
text: するわけないよ
trans: Why would I do that?

name: プロデューサー
text:
……俺が思うに、甘奈は、
『誰かが求める甘奈』に添おうとしただけだ
trans:
When I think about it, it seems like you're trying so
hard to be the "Amana everyone wants to see."

name: プロデューサー
text: それは、責められることじゃない
trans:
And I totally understand why you'd want that and I
can't blame you for that.

name: 甘奈
trans: ...But still...

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈はきっと──……
そうじゃなきゃ甘奈が嫌われちゃうからって……
trans:
I think in the near future, I might—no, that's not it.
I'm worried that I might end up being hated...

name: 甘奈
text: 結局は、誰かのためじゃなくて、甘奈のために──
trans:
...But in the end, it's not just about what others 
think. It's about what I want for myself—

name: プロデューサー
text: いいんだよ
trans: It's alright.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……ちょっと変なことを言おうか、甘奈
──ちゃんとしなくてもいいぞ
trans:
Amana, I'm going to say something a bit odd, okay...?
You don't have to push yourself too hard to be
perfect.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……甘奈が思う、『ちゃんとしていない甘奈』だって
きっと、たくさんの人に受け入れてもらえるはずだから
trans:
Even if you think you're not the ideal person you
want to show, I'm sure many people will appreciate
you for who you truly are.

name: プロデューサー
text:
失敗したって、ずるくたって
嫌だなって思うんじゃなくて、支えたいと思う人はいる
trans:
Even if you stumble, make mistakes, or feel like giving
up, there's always someone who will understand and
support you no matter what....

name: プロデューサー
text: ……ほら、筆頭はここにさ！
trans: ...And that person is right here with you!

name: 甘奈
text: ……甘奈、ダメダメかもしれないよ……？
trans:
....But, I still might not be able to do it at all,
you know...?

name: プロデューサー
text: 問題があるなら、一緒に解決すればいい
trans: If there's a problem, we can solve it together.

name: 甘奈
text: ……失望させちゃうかも……
trans: ...I might even disappoint you....

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは、それは俺の器の問題だな？
受け止めてみせるよ
trans:
Haha, but disappointing me is up to my own judgment,
isn't it? Come on, lay it on me.

name: 甘奈
trans: ...Fufu...

name: 甘奈
text: ……プロデューサーさんは、優しいね……
trans: Producer-san is really kind....
